name: Vadim Vyacheslavovich Dopkynas
description: Belarusian theatrical figure, author of the first production in the professional theater of the play by Alexander Vampilov

bio.description: Born into a family of employees, who in the late 1930s came to the development of the Soviet North. After the war, the family returned to Minsk.
Graduated from technical school in Minsk.
He graduated from the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute with a degree in drama theater and film actor.
Teacher of the Minsk House of Culture vocational education.
Director of the national theaters of the Belarusian Republican House of Folk Art.
Worked at the Minsk Gorky State Pedagogical Institute.
Worked at the Minsk Institute of Culture.
Director of the Belarusian Theater for Young Spectators.
He worked in the Ministry of Culture of Belarus, including the head of the department of the ministry responsible for the work of theaters in the country.
Worked as lead editor of the Concert Orchestra of Belarus.
Head of the literary and dramatic part and assistant art director of the Yanka Kupala Academic Theater.
